mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from dongcode where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.roadName, h.roadNameBonbun, h.roadNameBubun, h.roadNameSeq, h.roadNameCode, h.bonbun, h.apartmentName, h.buildYear, h.dongCode, h.dong, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select round(avg(cast(replace(dealAmount, ',' ,'')as unsigned))) from housedeal hd where hd.aptCode=h.aptCode) avgPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by h.apartmentName;

select h.aptCode, h.roadName, h.roadNameBonbun, h.roadNameBubun, h.roadNameSeq, h.roadNameCode, h.bonbun, h.apartmentName, h.buildYear, h.dongCode, h.dong, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select round(avg(cast(replace(dealAmount, ',' ,'')as unsigned))) from housedeal hd where hd.aptCode=h.aptCode) avgPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where h.apartmentName like concat('%', #{aptName},'%') order by h.apartmentName;
